RoomTypes.Name: Forest
RoomTypes.Description: A lush, green room filled with towering trees, rustling leaves, and the occasional bird song.

RoomTypes.Name: Marsh
RoomTypes.Description: A wet, foggy area with soft, muddy ground and the sound of distant water

Behaviours.Name: Sink
Behaviours.Description: You suddenly start sinking into hidden quicksand, struggling for a foothold.

RoomTypes.name: Desert
RoomTypes.description: A hot, dry room with sandy floors, sparse vegetation, and a glaring sun.

Behaviours.Name: Dehydration
Behaviours.Description: Intense heat takes its toll, leaving you dizzy and dangerously dehydrated.

RoomTypes.Name: Hills
RoomTypes.Description: Rolling hills with grassy knolls and a panoramic view of the distant terrain.
